analysis.key_quote: By enabling the politicization of a much larger number of federal jobs, Schedule F will create a chaotic turnover of federal staff every 2-4 years and thus significantly damage the collective experience and proficiency of the federal government.
analysis.rationale: The comment opposes the proposed Schedule F by highlighting concerns about the politicization of federal jobs and the potential loss of institutional knowledge, which aligns with the themes of nonpartisan governance and the integrity of civil service.
